trans-unit.source: Unique name of the campaign (64 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Unique name of the campaign (64 characters max).

trans-unit.source: Specify which users will be targeted by this campaign (65535 bytes max, see <link xlink:href="9046ef43-ddfc-4be1-b52c-2504bd9d3097" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Audience Format</link>).
trans-unit.target: Specify which users will be targeted by this campaign (65535 bytes max, see <link xlink:href="9046ef43-ddfc-4be1-b52c-2504bd9d3097" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Audience Format</link>).

trans-unit.source: By default, all users will be targeted.
trans-unit.target: By default, all users will be targeted.

trans-unit.source: If you set <codeInline>pushMode</codeInline> property to <codeInline>manual</codeInline>, the only thing you can specify in the audience is the push quota filterCaC.
trans-unit.target: If you set <codeInline>pushMode</codeInline> property to <codeInline>manual</codeInline>, the only thing you can specify in the audience is the push quota filterCaC.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating if the campaign is protected by an access key.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating if the campaign is protected by an access key.

trans-unit.source: If the value is <codeInline>true</codeInline>, the following actions will require the same access key than the one provided in the Create command:
trans-unit.target: If the value is <codeInline>true</codeInline>, the following actions will require the same access key than the one provided in the Create command:

trans-unit.source: Category of the campaign (64 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Category of the campaign (64 characters max).

trans-unit.source: Categories can be used on the application side to customize campaigns.
trans-unit.target: Categories can be used on the application side to customize campaigns.

trans-unit.source: Defines how the campaign is pushed.
trans-unit.target: Defines how the campaign is pushed.

trans-unit.source: Never ending campaign, the campaign will be delivered to your existing users and also to your new users.
trans-unit.target: Never ending campaign, the campaign will be delivered to your existing users and also to your new users.

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the campaign will be delivered only to your existing users (campaign will stop after that).
trans-unit.target: In this mode, the campaign will be delivered only to your existing users (campaign will stop after that).

trans-unit.source: In this mode, the campaign will not be pushed automatically to devices.
trans-unit.target: In this mode, the campaign will not be pushed automatically to devices.

trans-unit.source: You will have to use the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> command to push the campaign to your end-users.
trans-unit.target: You will have to use the <link xlink:href="c4947f45-9970-4baa-95fc-6ea116415430#push" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Push</link> command to push the campaign to your end-users.

trans-unit.source: Campaigns can be pushed multiple times to the same device.
trans-unit.target: Campaigns can be pushed multiple times to the same device.

trans-unit.source: Defines when the campaign should be delivered.
trans-unit.target: Defines when the campaign should be delivered.

trans-unit.source: Campaign will be delivered as soon as possible.
trans-unit.target: Campaign will be delivered as soon as possible.

trans-unit.source: Campaign will be only delivered when the application is in background (out of app).
trans-unit.target: Campaign will be only delivered when the application is in background (out of app).

trans-unit.source: Campaign will be delivered when the application is running.
trans-unit.target: Campaign will be delivered when the application is running.

trans-unit.source: Array containing the list of activities in which the campaign can be delivered.
trans-unit.target: Array containing the list of activities in which the campaign can be delivered.

trans-unit.source: If the platform is iOS, this option can also be set if <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> is set to <codeInline>any</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: If the platform is iOS, this option can also be set if <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> is set to <codeInline>any</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: In that case, if the campaign is received when the application is launched, it will be delivered only in the specified list of activities.
trans-unit.target: In that case, if the campaign is received when the application is launched, it will be delivered only in the specified list of activities.

trans-unit.source: The date at which the campaign should be started.
trans-unit.target: The date at which the campaign should be started.

trans-unit.source: The date shall conform to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z'.
trans-unit.target: The date shall conform to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z'.

trans-unit.source: The date at which the campaign should be finished.
trans-unit.target: The date at which the campaign should be finished.

trans-unit.source: The date shall conform to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z'.
trans-unit.target: The date shall conform to the following format: yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'Z'.

trans-unit.source: The id of the time zone to use for the <codeInline>startTime</codeInline> and <codeInline>endTime</codeInline> dates.
trans-unit.target: The id of the time zone to use for the <codeInline>startTime</codeInline> and <codeInline>endTime</codeInline> dates.

trans-unit.source: If not provided, the two date attributes will be expressed using the device timezone.
trans-unit.target: If not provided, the two date attributes will be expressed using the device timezone.

trans-unit.source: Defines how the notification should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Defines how the notification should be displayed.

trans-unit.source: Display the notification using a standard system notification.
trans-unit.target: Display the notification using a standard system notification.

trans-unit.source: Display the notification using an in-app banner notification.
trans-unit.target: Display the notification using an in-app banner notification.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether or not you want to display the resource icon in notification content.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether or not you want to display the resource icon in notification content.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether or not you want the notification to be closeable.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether or not you want the notification to be closeable.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether or not you want the system notification to make a vibration.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether or not you want the system notification to make a vibration.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>notificationType</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>system</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>notificationType</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>system</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether or not you want the system notification to make a sound.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether or not you want the system notification to make a sound.

trans-unit.source: The notificationType property must be set to system.
trans-unit.target: The notificationType property must be set to system.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether or not you want the native Apple Push notification to make a sound.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether or not you want the native Apple Push notification to make a sound.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline> or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline> or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: If you want to play a custom sound, see the <codeInline>notificationOptions</codeInline> property.
trans-unit.target: If you want to play a custom sound, see the <codeInline>notificationOptions</codeInline> property.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether or not you want the native Windows Notification Service to make a sound.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether or not you want the native Windows Notification Service to make a sound.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating whether or not you want the native Apple Push notification to update the badge icon to the number of unread messages.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating whether or not you want the native Apple Push notification to update the badge icon to the number of unread messages.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline> or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline> or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Title of the notification (2000 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Title of the notification (2000 characters max).

trans-unit.source: This field supports HYPERLINK "https://app.capptain.com/doc/SaaS/Reach%20API/Campaign%20format/Announcement.html" \l "reach-format-appinfo-markers" appInfo markers.
trans-unit.target: This field supports HYPERLINK "https://app.capptain.com/doc/SaaS/Reach%20API/Campaign%20format/Announcement.html" \l "reach-format-appinfo-markers" appInfo markers.

trans-unit.source: Message of the notification (4000 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Message of the notification (4000 characters max).

trans-unit.source: Optional image encoded in base 64 (65535 bytes max).Usually included in the right part of in app notifications (or as a banner if there is neither text nor content icon).
trans-unit.target: Optional image encoded in base 64 (65535 bytes max).Usually included in the right part of in app notifications (or as a banner if there is neither text nor content icon).

trans-unit.source: For Android system notifications, the image is used as the large icon (displayed only on Android 3+).
trans-unit.target: For Android system notifications, the image is used as the large icon (displayed only on Android 3+).

trans-unit.source: Additional platform specific options as a sub JSON object.
trans-unit.target: Additional platform specific options as a sub JSON object.

trans-unit.source: The available properties are listed in the following table.
trans-unit.target: The available properties are listed in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Title of the announcement (128 characters max).This field supports appInfo markers.
trans-unit.target: Title of the announcement (128 characters max).This field supports appInfo markers.

trans-unit.source: Description of the poll (65535 bytes max).This field supports appInfo markers.
trans-unit.target: Description of the poll (65535 bytes max).This field supports appInfo markers.

trans-unit.source: Text of the action button (64 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Text of the action button (64 characters max).

trans-unit.source: Text of the exit button (64 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Text of the exit button (64 characters max).

trans-unit.source: Reach campaigns can be localized using an optional JSON object.
trans-unit.target: Reach campaigns can be localized using an optional JSON object.

trans-unit.source: The JSON key is a two-character language code as specified by the ISO 639-1 standard.
trans-unit.target: The JSON key is a two-character language code as specified by the ISO 639-1 standard.

trans-unit.source: The corresponding value is an object containing the localizable properties: <codeInline>title</codeInline>, <codeInline>body</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationTitle</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationMessage</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationImage</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationOptions</codeInline>, <codeInline>actionButtonText</codeInline>, <codeInline>exitButtonText</codeInline>
trans-unit.target: The corresponding value is an object containing the localizable properties: <codeInline>title</codeInline>, <codeInline>body</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationTitle</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationMessage</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationImage</codeInline>, <codeInline>notificationOptions</codeInline>, <codeInline>actionButtonText</codeInline>, <codeInline>exitButtonText</codeInline>

trans-unit.source: Array containing questions as described in the <link xlink:href="4df21e21-750d-4c0c-a1c8-da6cfb095e9d#poll_question_format" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Poll question format</link>.
trans-unit.target: Array containing questions as described in the <link xlink:href="4df21e21-750d-4c0c-a1c8-da6cfb095e9d#poll_question_format" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Poll question format</link>.

trans-unit.source: The following table describes the additional, platform-specific notificationOptions that you can set:
trans-unit.target: The following table describes the additional, platform-specific notificationOptions that you can set:

trans-unit.source: Multi line message shown in expanded notifications on Android 4.1+ devices (4000 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Multi line message shown in expanded notifications on Android 4.1+ devices (4000 characters max).

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>notificationType</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>system</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>notificationType</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>system</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: URL of a remote image displayed in expanded notifications on Android 4.1+ devices with the following constraints:
trans-unit.target: URL of a remote image displayed in expanded notifications on Android 4.1+ devices with the following constraints:

trans-unit.source: The URL length is limited to 2000 characters.
trans-unit.target: The URL length is limited to 2000 characters.

trans-unit.source: The image size must be less than 4 MiB.
trans-unit.target: The image size must be less than 4 MiB.

trans-unit.source: The following MIME types are supported:
trans-unit.target: The following MIME types are supported:

trans-unit.source: URL scheme must be HTTP or HTTPS (with valid SSL certificate).
trans-unit.target: URL scheme must be HTTP or HTTPS (with valid SSL certificate).

trans-unit.source: Incompatible with <codeInline>bigText</codeInline>, only one of the fields can be set.
trans-unit.target: Incompatible with <codeInline>bigText</codeInline>, only one of the fields can be set.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>notificationType</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>system</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>notificationType</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>system</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The name of a sound file in the application bundle.
trans-unit.target: The name of a sound file in the application bundle.

trans-unit.source: The sound in this file is played as an alert.
trans-unit.target: The sound in this file is played as an alert.

trans-unit.source: If the sound file doesn’t exist or default is specified as the value, the default alert sound is played.
trans-unit.target: If the sound file doesn’t exist or default is specified as the value, the default alert sound is played.

trans-unit.source: The audio must be in one of the audio data formats that are compatible with system sounds; see Preparing Custom Alert Sounds for details.
trans-unit.target: The audio must be in one of the audio data formats that are compatible with system sounds; see Preparing Custom Alert Sounds for details.

trans-unit.source: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to any or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to any or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The action text is the title of the right button of the alert or the value of the unlock slider, where the value replaces ‘unlock’ in ‘slide to unlock’.
trans-unit.target: The action text is the title of the right button of the alert or the value of the unlock slider, where the value replaces ‘unlock’ in ‘slide to unlock’.

trans-unit.source: ‘View’ (localized to the preferred language) is used as the default value.The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline> or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: ‘View’ (localized to the preferred language) is used as the default value.The <codeInline>deliveryTime</codeInline> property must be set to <codeInline>any</codeInline> or <codeInline>background</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: Title of the question (256 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Title of the question (256 characters max).

trans-unit.source: Poll questions can be localized using an optional JSON object.
trans-unit.target: Poll questions can be localized using an optional JSON object.

trans-unit.source: The JSON key is a two-character language code as specified by the ISO 639-1 standard.
trans-unit.target: The JSON key is a two-character language code as specified by the ISO 639-1 standard.

trans-unit.source: The corresponding value is an object containing the localizable property <codeInline>title</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The corresponding value is an object containing the localizable property <codeInline>title</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: List of possible choices for this question.
trans-unit.target: List of possible choices for this question.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <link xlink:href="4df21e21-750d-4c0c-a1c8-da6cfb095e9d#poll_choice_format" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Poll choice format</link>.
trans-unit.target: For more information, see <link xlink:href="4df21e21-750d-4c0c-a1c8-da6cfb095e9d#poll_choice_format" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Poll choice format</link>.

trans-unit.source: Title of the choice (256 characters max).
trans-unit.target: Title of the choice (256 characters max).

trans-unit.source: Poll choices can be localized using an optional JSON object.
trans-unit.target: Poll choices can be localized using an optional JSON object.

trans-unit.source: The JSON key is a two-character language code as specified by the ISO 639-1 standard.
trans-unit.target: The JSON key is a two-character language code as specified by the ISO 639-1 standard.

trans-unit.source: The corresponding value is an object containing the localizable property <codeInline>title</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: The corresponding value is an object containing the localizable property <codeInline>title</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: A flag indicating if this choice is the default choice for the associated question.
trans-unit.target: A flag indicating if this choice is the default choice for the associated question.

trans-unit.source: Only one choice in the array can have this value set to true.
trans-unit.target: Only one choice in the array can have this value set to true.

trans-unit.source: AppInfo markers are special strings which are replaced with user information (also known as appInfo) when the campaign is pushed.
trans-unit.target: AppInfo markers are special strings which are replaced with user information (also known as appInfo) when the campaign is pushed.

trans-unit.source: This is used to create personalized campaigns based on <codeInline>appInfo</codeInline>.
trans-unit.target: This is used to create personalized campaigns based on <codeInline>appInfo</codeInline>.

trans-unit.source: The format of the replacement string is <codeInline>${%%amp;lt;appInfo%%amp;gt;}</codeInline> where <appInfo> is the key of the appInfo that should be replaced.
trans-unit.target: The format of the replacement string is <codeInline>${%%amp;lt;appInfo%%amp;gt;}</codeInline> where <appInfo> is the key of the appInfo that should be replaced.

trans-unit.source: The appInfo of a device can be updated using the Tag command or using the SDK’s <codeInline>sendAppInfo</codeInline> function.
trans-unit.target: The appInfo of a device can be updated using the Tag command or using the SDK’s <codeInline>sendAppInfo</codeInline> function.

trans-unit.source: For instance, consider the following text:
trans-unit.target: For instance, consider the following text:

trans-unit.source: When the campaign is pushed on a device, <codeInline>${name}</codeInline> is replaced with the content of the appInfo identified with key <codeInline>name</codeInline> for the corresponding user.
trans-unit.target: When the campaign is pushed on a device, <codeInline>${name}</codeInline> is replaced with the content of the appInfo identified with key <codeInline>name</codeInline> for the corresponding user.

trans-unit.source: Since personalization works by replacing a marker by its related appInfo content, you have to make sure the user has the proper appInfo defined.
trans-unit.target: Since personalization works by replacing a marker by its related appInfo content, you have to make sure the user has the proper appInfo defined.

trans-unit.source: Here we suppose the targeted user has an appInfo named <codeInline>${name}</codeInline> with value being set to the name of the user.
trans-unit.target: Here we suppose the targeted user has an appInfo named <codeInline>${name}</codeInline> with value being set to the name of the user.

trans-unit.source: See the format above to know which fields are supporting appInfo markers.
trans-unit.target: See the format above to know which fields are supporting appInfo markers.
